item.title: Switching to automatic theme detection for pages (auto.css: dark or light theme).
item.description: Switching to automatic theme detection for pages (auto.css: dark or light theme).

item.title: I removed the tag cloud on the main page again, there is a search form for that. + I undeleted and restored it (more faster 1 click).
item.description: I removed the tag cloud on the main page again, there is a search form for that. + I undeleted and restored it (more faster 1 click).

item.title: The light theme is now set by default. (Because during the day, the dark theme was enabled for the browser or OS dark mode, but the light theme is more suitable).
item.description: The light theme is now set by default. (Because during the day, the dark theme was enabled for the browser or OS dark mode, but the light theme is more suitable).

item.title: Brought back the tag cloud on the main page (more convenient).
item.description: Brought back the tag cloud on the main page (more convenient).

item.title: I removed links that cause "mindless scrolling" (hashtag cloud on the main page)
item.description: I removed links that cause "mindless scrolling" (hashtag cloud on the main page)

item.title: The default theme is now only "auto" (light and dark).
item.description: The default theme is now only "auto" (light and dark).

item.title:
Ctrl+Shift+R, Ctrl+F5 or Shift+F5 - Force a hard refresh page. Refresh a webpage ignoring cache.
If you updated the page on the hosting but don't see any changes.
item.description:
Ctrl+Shift+R, Ctrl+F5 or Shift+F5 - Force a hard refresh page. Refresh a webpage ignoring cache.
If you updated the page on the hosting but don't see any changes.
